prompt:
Genera un pom.xml COMPLETO e valido per Spring Boot 3 (Java 21) con:
- groupId: com.panda
- artifactId: events-backend
- version: 0.1.0
- packaging: jar
Dipendenze:
- spring-boot-starter-web
- spring-boot-starter-validation
- spring-boot-starter-data-jpa
- postgresql
- flyway-core
- springdoc-openapi-starter-webmvc-ui
- lombok (optional) ma se lo usi, configura annotationProcessorPaths
Test:
- spring-boot-starter-test
Plugin:
- spring-boot-maven-plugin
Assicurati che compili.
RISPOSTA: SOLO il contenuto del file pom.xml.
